data.actual_result: THe tooltip gets out of bounds and you are unable to read what it says
data.expected_result: The tooltip is moved to the left to fit into the client (as e.g. the Help tooltip does)
data.short_description: In languages where "Server Owner" was translated into one word, the tooltip goes out of the client if the Owner has a lengthy name
data.steps_to_repro: - Be the Owner of a Server that shows the Owner Crown and change the length of your name to get truncated in the member list - Change your language to German (and restart your client) - Hover over the Server Owner Crown and observe the tooltip
